trends: There have been no other sightings in Endicott
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: 3 stars all night,same locations all night,until about 330am until around 430am,would be active with lights and movements,and lit up ground above our farm and neighbors acreage.
divs: sighting details3 stars all night,same locations all night,until about 330am until around 430am,would be active with lights and movements,and lit up ground above our farm and neighbors acreage.would go out into the hottub every night for two weeks and seen this,my husband didn't believe me i was telling him what i was seeing and i finally got him to come out to the hottub one night for about 1o minutes and he seen the star move towards us @ high speed and shot straight up and disappeared above us and he ran into the house and told me he was never going back out again. the same morning about 1130-12noon i heard a helicopter outside,i got up went out on the deck and seen a big black chopper with two propellors one on each end with two big square doors both were open on both sides and i could see people inside looking out of the doors flying back and forth for about 40-45 minutes,and then flew off.(best if i could explain in voice or person,to much since then that has been happening on our place.)snapped a photo in brod daylight taken july 23rd 2007, of a unknown creature that game and parks could not tell me what it is or was. but i know its not a dog. and its green with a horn on its head stands about 2 1\2 feet tall,looks like gray transparent wings lifting up a wooden pallet.i cant exsplain in writing very well as it would be easier to speek about all of this.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Viewing Distance: 20 Feet or Less, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile
